column5: Another few days like today and we will be launching our boats...    The rest of the lake is still ice covered...  Most of the snow is gone except in the woods...

Looks like most of the Kawarthas should be a go for the weekend.  Simcoe is looking good as well.  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/modis.php?region=o&page=1&template=sub&image=t1.13105.1546.LakeOntario.143.250m.jpg
Thanks for that, Beans.  I'm on the south shore.  Will be a little later but not much longer

Six days later...    note how high the water is...the little island is nearly submerged...  some bays and lagoons along the north shoreline still have ice from the high south winds yesterday blowing the loose ice in...
Amazing what a difference a few days can make Norm !!
